# context

**Instance Property**

The current state of the playable content endpoint.

## Declaration

```swift
var context: MPPlayableContentManagerContext { get }
```

## Retrieving information on currently playing items

- **nowPlayingIdentifiers**: The content items currently playing based on their identifiers.

items.description: The content items currently playing based on their identifiers.
items.name: nowPlayingIdentifiers
